website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful, practical piece that exceeds most expectations once assembled.
pros: Solid wood with a beautiful dark brown finish
Classic, elegant look complements both modern and traditional décor
cons: Occasional quality control issues, including missing or damaged pieces

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality,  too narrow for some electronics
customer_reviews.text: Really nice unit. Love the real wood (or close enough to real wood.) Its sturdy, has nice doors and nobs. The finish matches my vintage 1920s dark furniture as well. My only concern is that is appears to scratch easily. Just assembling it we scratched the top. Assemble took about 2.5 hours mostly in all the details of doors and back panels. The only thing I don't like is how narrow it is. The shelves are not deep enough to accommodate my VCR (I know, old school) without it hanging over the front edge about an inch. I didn't think to measure for this. Otherwise I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie VintageDancer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Just as other reviews stated, it doesn't come with instructions. But it wasn't too hard to figure out if you've put other things like this together before. Took about 1.5 hour for two people. BUT, it's absolutely gorgeous. It's solid and looks like it came from somewhere like Ashley. Our 55" TV fits perfectly. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Workman

customer_reviews.title: Never pay for Amazon to come assemble products
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and paid to have Amazon assemble it. This has been sitting in my garage since July 19th. You have made me reschedule the assemby 3 times and never got back to me as bout the third change. I am disgusted and want my money back for the assembly. In a city as big as Pittsburgh, it should not be as difficult to schedule an item assembly. After attempting to put this item together myself, the item is crooked and not all of the pieces fit. I recently upgraded to Prime. I as of now I am thinking of cancelling my membership after this sloppy experience from Amazon. Disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Reddkitten

customer_reviews.title: Loved this sideboard/tv stand
customer_reviews.text: This sideboard/tv stand is beautiful. Easy to assemble (even with kids around), though the directions were slightly wonky. I chose it for the color, style, and price (price was the best part). I'm always nervous to purchase furniture from Amazon but this was a great purchase. I did switch the backings so that there wasn't a visible hole for tv stand use (and could function well as a sideboard/buffet/server in our dining room). Lots of natural light in my photo, I would say the wood looks night *quite* as light as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not the most difficult I've had to assemble, but definitely the least "assembly ready". All of the shelf holes are too small for the pegs, which means pounding on flimsy press board. The marks for screwing in door magnets weren't visible & things weren't clearly marked. Once it was put together, it did look pretty- but half of the electronics didn't fit inside the cabinet. And here we are, a week later- and the whole thing is bowing & sagging in the middle. The doors & drawers no longer open & close correctly due to the sag, so this whole thing has lost usage almost immediately. Not worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GREAT IN THE SPARE ROOM
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my spare room for extra storage and for the second TV. Mt grandkids stay over in the room and I needed a place for their books and small toys. This is great for that. It looks nice, was easy to assemble (I'm a 63 yr. old woman) and vert stylish. Be careful when attaching the doors to make sure they are level, but other than that, I am very pleased with the quality of the packaging and the product. Arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: espy

customer_reviews.title: If You are considering This piece, Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece! It adds so much character to our hearts home. The wood is pretty solid and the glass doors adds so much style. We used it on a wall adjacent to our furniture. We placed our projector and beats sound system in the open slights. In pre drilled wholes make for a easy way to conceal the wires
customer_reviews.author: Lashonda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this with the help of my teenage son. When assembling the doors, it’s very helpful to have a second person. There was only a moderate amount of cussing. Overall, I am really happy with this purchase. The color, material, quality and dimensions are perfect for our little entertainment nook. We have a 54’ tv screen.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Nice Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice piece for large screen TV's. There are a couple of issues I had with this though. Firstly, it takes quite some time to assemble because it comes in a LOT of pieces. Not that it's terribly difficult to assemble, it just takes some time. Secondly, mine came with a split in the bottom piece which is somewhat critical because one of the doors drag as a result. Once I had it assembled, I wasn't going to send it back, so I'll just have to deal with it. I don't open the doors often anyway. Otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Yarg

customer_reviews.title: extremely nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well, easy to put together, but I used some battery operated tools I had that made it easier though. The whole thing is all real wood, knot Pine. Extremely nice piece of furniture. I didn't want the holes in the top of the cabinet the chords go through so I just switched it to the bottom piece and you can't see them because I'm not using it as a TV cabinet. I'm using it is dining room furniture
customer_reviews.author: Southernkarma10

customer_reviews.title: The piece looks nice, but for the money
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a major piece cracked. Seller said it would take 8 weeks to send a replacement part. After contacting Amazon, Amazon sent a whole new unit for free within two days. Assembly is simple and comparable to Ikea furniture. After assembly, drawers rattle loudly. The pre-drilled holes for shelving pegs are too small for pegs and have to be drilled out to mount the shelving. The piece looks nice, but for the money, the product quality and customer service are horrible and absolutely not worth it. I wish I'd never bought this.
customer_reviews.author: James Jastrzebski

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged for shipping. LOTs of styrofoam padding material. Decent instructions with a package of extra hardware that was not needed. The only thing that kept this from a 5 star rating was how weak the securing of the back panels was. Didn't realize the flaw until it was too late and some damage can be seen from the front inside the cabinet. Be careful how you run those screws in. Would have glued the backs on if I was to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Billaban

customer_reviews.title: This looks amazing under my TV
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing under my TV, it was fairly easy to put together, I was able to do it by myself, but would have been easier if I had my husband helping me! It started to "chip" in a few places when inserting the screws, but the heads of the screws covered everything. The doors were the hardest to put on, just the mere act of holding the door and getting the hinges to line up just right as to not rub when you closed the cabinet door took the longest to put together!
customer_reviews.author: countrygirl777

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for shoddy prep work
customer_reviews.text: As I was almost done putting the thing together, I noticed the doors wouldn't fit correctly in order to complete assembly. I looked and looked to figure out what I had done wrong. I had others look as well. Apparently, the doors didn't fit correctly because the holes that had been drilled to connect all of the pieces were not measured correctly. So even if I tried disassembling and reassembling the whole thing, it still wouldn't work because I would have to drill new holes in order to have it all fit together perfectly. I love the design but find it very irritating that I spent so much money on a piece of furniture that doesn't even work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece
customer_reviews.text: I really debated over and over about whether to purchase a cabinet on-line. I read over all the reviews, and finally thought I'd just go for it. I am more than pleased. It arrived intact. It is solid wood. It just as pictured. Nothing was scratched or broken. All the pieces lined up perfectly. Took 1 1/2 hours to put together. Nothing was wrong with it. Hardware is just what I wanted. Just can't say enough. I absolutely love this cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: but this media center is beautiful, looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this media center is beautiful, looks just like the picture. Is real wood, not just a thin layer of wood over particle board. That said, it's a soft wood and will dent easily, but taken care of with normal wear and tear it appears it will hold up ok. Was impressed with packaging and instructions, my wife assembled it with my power driver and the tools provided in less than 2 hours last evening, while drinking alcohol, and said all predrilled holes were on point and instructions easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Slater22

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece and one other in the same line. I am glad I did, as both were missing screw bag #4. Fortunately screw bag #4 had different types of screws in each piece, so I was able to use some screws from each (plus each piece of furniture came with extra hardware, kudos on that). As for the furniture itself, both pieces arrived in fine shape and assembled exactly per the instructions. Once assembled, it felt like very good quality furniture. My only complaint is the drawers are on very cheap sliders and are quite honestly the only disappointment I have with this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Shreksbrother

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I are very happy with how nice it looks with our Sony Bravia ...
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up with my pick-up truck at the UPS warehouse center to try and avoid any damage. It was so heavy it was all the UPS clerk and I could do in loading in the back of my truck. My son-in- law helped me unload and assemble it, this took about 3 hours. My wife and I are very happy with how nice it looks with our Sony Bravia TV sitting on top of it. There was only one small crack in it which was located on the inside and no one will ever notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just put this together for us and the whole time he was raving at how well it was packaged. The company really did a good job and paid attention to details to ensure it arrived in good condition. Took a couple hours to put it together, but wasn't difficult at all. And on top of that we love the look. It's a very solid piece and the price/value--after looking at dozens of TV stands--is definitely fantastic. We are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, it's not just a TV/Media center!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this piece looks in my dining room! When we moved in, I already had the dining room set but wanted a piece to store special items like napkins and silverware for holidays. I also wanted a piece that I could use to put some decorative things on, which I plan on buying off of Amazon. I can't speak on how easy it was to put together because my husband did it all for me but judging on how quickly he had together, I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect blend of quality and cost.
customer_reviews.text: Ideally I would but a nice piece of hand crafted wood furniture with tons of character that I can pass down for generations...but that would cost thousands or tens of thousands of dollars. On the other hand, I could just buy a cheap Ikea or Walmart particle board TV stand with fake plastic veneer and save money, but have it look cheap. This is a great compromise between cost and quality. It doesn't look or feel cheap but for $250 or so it's hard to go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: M. Behnke

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cabinet. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great cabinet, but anyone ordering this cabinet should know in advance that it is truly a home assembly project as none of the pieces or sections are pre-built. That being said, I built it myself and the instructions were clear and easy to follow. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because the holes were slightly mismarked on the back panel which caused me to put a screw through the back panel, leaving a hole. Otherwise, everything went as it was supposed to. The quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: whtravin

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture is inexpensive (compared to furniture stores) but beautiful. The only wood on this that looks cheap is the backing. Everything else is very solid. Assembly was easy since every piece (including hardware) was labeled with a letter/number that corresponded to the instructions. Holes were pre-drilled so all you need is your allen wrench and screwdriver. I was able to assemble all of it myself, but had my husband help with the doors to get proper alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P.

customer_reviews.title: I like this Media Stand A Lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this Media Stand A Lot. Quality (real) wood and hardware and it looks Great!. it would have gotten 5 stars but because I used every single spare cam that was provided. I dont think it was user error I have built a lot of DIY furnature in the past and most of it was crappy MDF furniture that will explode if you screw up the cam. Some of the wood was just slightly bent that it was difficult to get multiple cam and pins to line up
customer_reviews.author: Brady C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful console fot tv
customer_reviews.text: Our tall tv console arrived yesterday. It was packaged very securely and there were no damaged pieces. The directions were included and were very easy to follow. It took my husband and me about three hours to put together with hand screwdrivers and the included hex wrench. As others have stated it is more beautiful than the pictures. We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this product 5 stars, but I couldn't for one reason. No pre-drilled holes on back to attach back panels. I had to pre-drill myself (no biggie) but instructions state there should be holes available. The quality is great and it looks fantastic!! No joke, it's a solid piece of furniture. The components used to put it together are beefy. I think this is a piece that will last for a long time. I would not hesitate to purchase again. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent value at $200
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value at $200! I searched for weeks to find an inexpensive piece made from solid wood that was big enough for a large TV. I read all of the reviews and purchased despite some of the harsh reviews - but I couldn't be happier! I put it together alone in about an hour and it was not at all difficult. Beautiful design looks like a nice piece of furniture vs a cheaply made tv stand.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Lee Norman Partrick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Searched all furniture sites for an affordable but high quality tv stand that looked like I paid alot for it...WELL...I found it..this Acadian Tall TV stand fit the bill..arrived in good but heavy condition box..had my handyman put it together which took about 2 hours as he took his time to make sure all was there..when finished this tv stand looked like I paid $1,000 bucks!..beautiful color and quality..made my 36inch tv look good and high enough to be impressive but still easy to view the tv..very pleased..love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Strong, and pleasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt be happier with this purchase. It was packed securely. No damage upon receiving. Instructions were easy to read and understand. I built it by myself and it took me about 2 hours. Very solid construction. We needed a solid, strong and durable entertainment stand. My 9 month old is starting to walk and he loves to stand up and hold on to this stand to balance himself. The last thing i wanted was some lightweight piece of junk stand that could fall on him. This is an awesome stand thats solid and looks great as well. It also comes with a wall anchor to prevent from tipping. We love our new entertainment stand and you will too!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great media cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice looking and highly functional media cabinet. Has holes for cables, nice windowed doors (without looking pretentious), and is the perfect size for our particular application. Assembly is straight-forward and the directions are well written. My only beef is that they did not drill pilot holes for the backing to be attached (the instructions said they should exist, so this is a manufacturing screw-up). I was able to drill my own holes without much fuss, but someone without a drill or experience using one would likely have a hard time.
customer_reviews.author: Area Man

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was VERY surprised at how well this piece is made! I looked through so many stands and read through a lot of reviews - both on and off Amazon and just stepped out on faith. There were no abrasions to the piece and it was relatively easy to put together by two of my friends - they said it was a lot of pieces but they did not seem to struggle at all with any portion of assembly. I am sooo pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Candie P.

customer_reviews.title: NO INSTRUCTIONS but easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This did not come with directions, had to go to Simpli-Home to download. Other than that, good directions and not hard to put together. It took me and my husband a couple hours and it looks great! the finish is darker than pictured but I think it looks much better dark.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Value for price 200$ around
customer_reviews.text: This is good table for price with your added time for installation .it's 250$ value table and your 2 hrs installation time , also you need drill bit to install few holes which they missed on back side table to add cover wood plates. But it's thinly drawers and big screws hate it which caused to make crack on some places while installation itself. I recommend this table if you are looking 200$ worth table and it's definently not 400$ worth , in Costco and local furniture shops have solid table for 400$ worth.
customer_reviews.author: Mani InCreDIbLe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit for this price. Solid wood.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid piece once it is assembled. Very sturdy. Solid wood throughout, no particle board, no cardboard. Be careful when setting screws into the back -- keep them centered and straight. I had to slightly trim the left and right back panels to get them to fit properly. Drawers need screws that are a quarter inch longer than provided.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Conover-Lewis

customer_reviews.title: beautiful piece. Took about 2-3 hrs to put together
customer_reviews.text: beautiful piece. Took about 2-3 hrs to put together. Fits our 52" great. My only complain is that the wood is super soft and scratches and dents very easily. I got a great price so I can't really complain. Still, I'd purchase again. It really is a beautiful stand
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Manley

customer_reviews.title: big deal but I would like to know what I'm getting into when I purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: This item did arrive fast. Beware nothing is assembled at all! This is not a big, big deal but I would like to know what I'm getting into when I purchase something. It has 3 deep dents in one side panel discovered after everything was completely unwrapped. I will see if I can just get the side panel replaced first. Does look nice, less the dents.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Winter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this piece!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking piece of furniture. Decent construction, better than most pieces that come from a box. Will be looking to purchase items matching this piece. Only reason for four stars: assembly instructions are not entirely clear however if you apply logic and common sense things will work out... I assembled this by myself although it says two people are required.
customer_reviews.author: Rushell

customer_reviews.title: Pay the price for the cheaper price but looks nice in the end.
customer_reviews.text: I do like it a lot. For the price, it looks great. The asembly was horrible. Took my boyfriend hours. Would have been smoother with another person, I wasn't home, it was just him. The doors didn't line up to close properly, so he had to move the magnets closer to catch the doors but they still don't close all the way. They give you tons of spare parts, which is great and never happens. Holds 55 inch tv perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrianne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product, real wood throughout, nice detailing, very well made. Straight forward assembly, instructions were clear, lots of extra hardware included, but took me 4 hours to assemble. Was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: The tv stand was extremely well packed and the instructions were easy to follow. It took about 3 hours to assemble (unpacking, sorting and building). It is all wood, sturdy and will hold up to a 55 inch tv. There is a lot of storage in the cabinet as well. I highly reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Really good and looks nice. Holds my 60 in tv just about perfectly. Everything went together like it should and no damage to the product. It's a solid piece of furniture especially for the price. The only draw back is the main screws are Allen screws. So putting this together will take a little time, but with a little whiskey and classic rock you won't mind it. Also if you have a PS4 it will no fit completely in the cubbie (to long). I just stuck my under my tv on the corner of the stand.
customer_reviews.author: blake albarado

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I'm Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Now that the cabinet is all assembled (several hours) it looks very nice. Be prepared for making adjustments and tweaking because it really doesn't go together as it should. Mine arrived without damage and shipped very quickly. The color was as pictured. It looks good and not cheap and feels sturdy with the TV on top. The height is good for TV viewing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, heavy duty and well built Not flimsy particle ...
customer_reviews.text: Live it. Took me about 5 hours to put together. My husband put the doors on. They were awkward for this non carpenter to hang. Very pretty, heavy duty and well built Not flimsy particle board. The drawers are a tad crooked because the tracks were mounted on the drawers slightly off. Eventually I will take the drawers apart and redo the tracks. Pre drilled doles did not line up on the back panels. But I love it
customer_reviews.author: Nolesrus

customer_reviews.title: Budget Friendly Without Sacrificing Quality
customer_reviews.text: This furniture piece exceeded my expectations. This is made of real wood and looks fantastic. It did take some time to put together and though one of the back panels was a bit too thick for the slot that it was supposed to fit in, but I was able to modify the corner so that it would fit, but the change I made is not one bit noticeable. This console is the perfect fit for the area I needing it for and is a classy addition to my decor without breaking the bank! The color is lovely and because it is real wood. Will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture. Actual wood. Not pressboard. Very easy to out together if youve put together ikea furniture this is the same but MUCH higer quality materials and hardware. They even includ a bag marked EXTRA with spare screws and parts. Took about 90 minutes to assemble by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: beautiful piece of furniture at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piece. It is just as pretty in real life as in the photos. It did take two plus hours to assemble, but the drawers and doors work perfectly. It is completely made of wood, no cardboard in the back. I ordered this and unfortunately the first one arrived with a big crack. It was fairly quick and easy getting a replacement though and the second one was beautiful. For the price, this is one heck of a good deal. I probably would have paid another two hundred dollars for it without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen G. Withee

customer_reviews.title: The cabinet has a good finishing. However
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet has a good finishing. However, one of the drawers didn't sit very well. Also one of the doors touch the upper panel before it shuts. I brought it up with Amazon customer care and they agreed to send a replacement. However, it took me 3 hours to assemble the cabinet and there was no way I was going to get it replaced and spend another 3 hours assembling it all over again. Also I am not sure how they expected me to return the first one. I finally decided to not exchange it and keep it with the defects.
customer_reviews.author: Rachit Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking tv stand! Took about 3 hours to put together and there are a few times when you really do need another set of hands to hold something while the other screws in, but mostly a one-person job. The wood is nice, but soft. It is fairly easy to scuff while putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: amyvp

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy piece of furniture for the price. Be warned that the boxes are very heavy. We put it together in a few hours , instructions were as expected- just photos as with everything nowadays. Went together easily with exception of the back panel , holes didn’t line up so we had to drill our own. Would otherwise give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth27932

customer_reviews.title: Nice and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Nice and elegant. Has a decent amount of space for storage and is quite sturdy. The magnets for the glass are very strong. Our only complaint is that some of the holes were not lined up correctly, resulting in the glass doors not fitting correctly, as well as the shelves. We were able to remedy this ourselves however so this was only a minor imperfection.
customer_reviews.author: The Wind Rider

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and durable TV stand! The wood is beautiful and looks very high-end. The set up instructions are lengthy, but very clear, detailed and the hardware is conveniently labeled and bagged separately. All pieces fit together perfectly. The only thing I wish was different, is the magnetic closures on the doors. They are on the bottom of the door, instead of the middle or top- which I feel would give it a stronger closure. It closes well, the magnets work, but could be stronger. However, that doesn't change my rating... still 5 stars all around!!
customer_reviews.author: clp406

customer_reviews.title: Love love love - so thrilled !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this media center. Solid wood, well written instructions, packaged so well and it came with EXTRA hardware! The pre-drilled holes lined up nicely and each panel was marked as LEFT or RIGHT. Really a nice piece. I’m thrilled. It took two people 4 hours to assemble this item but that’s because he’s a perfectionist.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture after a few complications
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very happy with the product and the customer service of this company, when the package aribee and we unboxed it we found one piece was cracked. Customer service call later new piece was shipped. Once that a river we found out the hardware package sent with it was the wrong one. Another call to customer service and boom new hardware package at the door. Hour later fully assembled and looking good very sturdy quality item.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect my needs. It looks nice and appears to be very sturdy. It was fairly easy to put together - it will take a good hour maybe hour and a half to put together and two people makes it easier.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but doors don't sit flush.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, it's a nice piece but the doors don't sit right. We'll fix it, eventually. Not enough of a problem for us to return it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaSmash

customer_reviews.title: Good product at great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. There were some gaps in assembly instructions - if they were written correctly, should not take more than 1 hour to put together. Took off 1 start because of instructions. Product wise - it looks much expensive than what it costs. Manufacturer - Please review instructions guide and have someone follow them to assemble and see if you notice any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: High quality piece
customer_reviews.text: So the piece is extremely high quality and, although laborious, relatively easy to put together. Heavy. It arrived on time, all pieces enclosed and in good shape. Looks wonderful. My only complaint is that it's not very deep. My bad for not checking the depth and comparing it to my Yamaha reciever. Now my reciever sticks out about 2". Really not a big deal and overall a grant piece for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and thought was put into assembly (well labeled ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and thought was put into assembly (well labeled and small pilot holes drill), I really appreciate this. We liked this product so much we bought matching longer model and two matching end tables.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet looks wonderful in my old Florida style living room, and I am particular about having quality furniture. It was easy to put together, and is a lot sturdier than I had anticipated. The doors are a bit difficult to get on and aligned properly, but it is doable with some patience. I'm glad i bought this and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer111984

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice stand once it get together but it did take ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice stand once it get together but it did take some time for my husband and a couple parts were not perfectly lined up for the holes like the right door. the stain/finish is not the best in my option alot of spots were not even but you cant really notice and price is good for real wood, item is very sturdy, we hang our 60" tv above it and it looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Hot-Mess Syndrome

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV stand for my daughter, she just loves it. Made of good quality material, only took her and my grandson approximately 2.5 hours to put together. It has become the center focus point of the living room!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and wife was happy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but the wood for the top is soft (maybe yellow pine) and can be marred easily. Be patient with the doors, and you can ensure that they are level when you hang them. When placing an XBOX1(Slim) in the cubby holes, there is little play for HDMI, but it will be flush with the front of the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: derfynole

customer_reviews.title: Overall it looks very nice but it too a few hours to put together
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were out of order but we figured it out. The drawers and one door seem to be out of alignment and I am not sure if it was my assembly or if the pre-drilled holes weren't in the right spot. Overall it looks very nice but it too a few hours to put together. I like that it has other matching furniture pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Z

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty easy to put together until it came to putting on the glass doors. They had marked where to screw them in but they were not aligned correctly. Other than that it’s a nice tv stand. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Very beautiful. Real wood. Assembly wasn’t terrible. Ended up buying a coffee table and end tables to go with it. Will be using this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Organizer for photo albums and LP record albums.
customer_reviews.text: The packing was very neat. The cabinet's construction was very sturdy and the finish was luxurious. Putting it together was somewhat tedious, but the reward was worth it. It's a nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Would've gave 5 stars but assembly was kind of painful
customer_reviews.author: Kiera B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buying experience!
customer_reviews.text: What a great experience! This is an exceptional product. Beautiful, great hardwoods, not too difficult to assemble (according to my son-in-law) and all the parts were there, even some extra hardware. The only negative was one of the door knobs was was bad so I'll need to get get a replacement so an A instead of A+.
customer_reviews.author: Odenia Biggs

customer_reviews.title: beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: beautiful piece of furniture. fits wonderfully into our family room and decor. Really is tall ! So our 60in actually looks like it is wall mounted eventhough its sitting nice and sturdy on a base on this stand! Assembly was easy too with instructions in english and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated between 1 and 2 stars. Several pieces came damaged and several others cracked while I was putting it together. One of the front drawer pieces didn't even have all of the drill holes so it just kind of hangs off on one side. The quality is just awful, but it does look nice put together. Bottom line, if you're not getting it on sale then I wouldn't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Castaldo

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color and very sturdy! So happy with this purchase! A little challenging to assemble but once done, you will never regret purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fermin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in about a 1.5 hours. It wasn't difficult at all and it's beautiful. The majority of the time spent was lining up the doors correctly. I love that it's higher than most of the cabinets that I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Lafleur

customer_reviews.title: Solid pine and well finished.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is solid wood, not particle board, it is pine so you have to handle it with care. It took about 1 1/2 hours to unpack and put together. We did have a problem with some holes that were not pre-drilled...but not a big deal. We like it so much that we are going to a second one for a different room.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Draper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition to My Living Room
customer_reviews.text: Although my tracking details still my order is being processed, I received it almost a week ago! It's beautiful and durable. Exactly what I wanted. It was easy to put together. The only problem I had was trying to get the back screwed on. I had to modify it and made it work. Wait.... ok, one more problem. The holes under the top don't line up where you connect it to the rest of the table. It called for 12 screws but only 5 if the holes lined up!
customer_reviews.author: CruzDiva

customer_reviews.title: VER VERY NICE CABINET
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tv cabinet! Better than expected. Very compact. Makes our room seem larger. I certainly recommend it. Looks much more expensive than it actually is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toby’s Girl

customer_reviews.title: nice looking piece
customer_reviews.text: looks very good . Great value and very good instruction. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pourkaviani

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice addition for our room
customer_reviews.text: Some of the holes weren't drilled properly and made a problem, but we were able to find a solution. We had an 11 page booklet of instructions and they were good. The finished product is wonderful. It makes our room! We love the fact that our TV is higher. The stand is a lovely addition to any room. We really like the storage space it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Sted

customer_reviews.title: I love this piece
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece! Even though it took about 3 hours to assemble, it was well worth it. It looks great in my living room. It is solid wood, no cheap particle board and veneer, and is very sturdy. I am so glad that I ordered it. The glass in the doors and pretty draw/handle pulls are a nice touch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: and she LOVED it and I LOVED it
customer_reviews.text: I will probably order another one for another room in my home, I got this for my oldest Daughter, and she LOVED it and I LOVED it, I almost wanted to take it from her and use in my Living Room, it's looks way more expensive that the cost of it actually is, and it's nice heavy thick wood.. VERY NICE... and my Daughter put it together, so that means, anybody could put it together.. VERY HAPPY with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Lanman

customer_reviews.title: we were very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours putting this tv table together, we were very pleased with it. However, in less than a year , the wood is starting to split. This table has been very well cared for, has had no unnecessary stress put on it, but is just splitting. For example, the top of the table is one solid piece of wood. In 2 separate areas the wood has splits. The allowed time for a return has expired so we are just stuck. I will not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: jane burgess

customer_reviews.title: ... one door pops open sometimes but overall i really like it and think it looks nice its a good ...
customer_reviews.text: took a while to set up myself and the one door pops open sometimes but overall i really like it and think it looks nice its a good size ... not this huge piece like i used to have but still enough storage space
customer_reviews.author: N.W.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely TV stand!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful piece of furniture! It took maybe an hour to put together, but well worth it. Very happy with it! UPDATE - I have now bought 3 more pieces from this set and it gets easier to assemble each time. Love this furniture!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Buyers remorse 1st online furniture purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with it the color and size was exactly what I wanted. my complaint is not with the product itself maybe how it was handled in packing because two pieces have large cracks in them. My husband had it almost all together before we noticed them. Don't want to have to take it back apart and find another box to ship it back it weighs 95 lbs feeling trapped by this purchase. Not sure what to do?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to assemble took me and my husband 2 hours to get together. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV media stand, easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: After reading lots of reviews on tall tv media stands, this one looked the best. It arrived well packed and everything was great. It was easy to put together, I did it myself and it looks really nice. Nice dark wood with a glossy finish, looks expensive. The back is made of thinner, stained plywood, not cardboard like so many of them have.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with this beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this beautiful piece of furniture. This looks very expensive, beautiful finish, and great size. I have my 60" TV on it and there is abundance of storage for cable box, DVD player, etc. The glass in the doors looks really nice. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is so beautiful! My husband put it together the way the instructions said and it came out gorgeous. This is very well made, all wood no partial board. This was way above my expectations, I am soooo happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: nice piece not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Its all wood. Nice look clean lines. Arrived with a small ding in top but I dont think it was due to shippng as there wasnt bare wood. Mustve been made that way. Fitment is not perfect doors just barely touch drawers when used. Spacing between drawers not perfect and must be related to when the tracks were attached in manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: truthbelievers3

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, solid wood, great design, all around great tv stand. Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture. I'm so glad I found it. It's perfect for our tv and I can store some favorite pieces on the sides. Great price.. don't pass it up!
customer_reviews.author: Grafton2

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE how it turned out
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, I put this furniture together but I must admit, that I did need a carpenter friend to help me to figure out several things and to turn some of the screws so that they were tight and level. I LOVE how it turned out, looks beautiful in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Gemini Woman

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful tv stand
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful tv stand , I have had it for a while now and the top piece where the TV sits , it split on the one side , not sure if it does it with all of them or I just got a messed up one .
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Murray

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Beautiful, and Well-made
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, assembled easily in just a couple of hours. Very sturdy, plenty of storage for DVDs, games, and sat/cable boxes...and, oh yeah - it looks beautiful. Have received many compliments and inquiries as to where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Yog-Sothoth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this extremely quick. The assembly was incredibly easy. Had to add some child locks to the cabinet doors. Looks great in my living room. I was hoping it would be a little longer but it really works out. No complaints from me on this one. If all of the products are of the same quality I will definitely be ordering more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice color, just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Very easy to put together. Love it😁😘🤪 will buy another one for my bedroom soon.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: AND it looks good? Sign me up
customer_reviews.text: $200 for a real wood entertainment center, AND it looks good? Sign me up! I've had this for about a month and it's fantastic. Build quality is top notch. Visibly at least 2 or 3 coats of varnish. Pretty great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: R1Fast

customer_reviews.title: Quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the care that was taken in packing the product. Every piece was wrapped and padded to protect. The quality and workmanship were impressive. I will be ordering from this company for future needs.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen shreve

customer_reviews.title: Love! It's tall enough and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love! It's tall enough and it looks great! Took a bit of time putting it together. End result is satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelin PB

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cabinet, but I can only give it an average rating. Even though I'm putting it together on my own things were going well until it was time to put the backs on. THERE'S NO PREDRILLED HOLES!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Catledge

customer_reviews.title: Good quality can be time consuming to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The directions were pretty good. Some pre drilled holes on the back didn't match up. Took 2 people about 3 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: grammy05

product_meta.title: Simpli Home Acadian SOLID WOOD Universal Tall TV Media Stand, 53 inch Wide, Farmhouse Rustic, Living Room Storage Shelves and Cabinets, for Flat Screen TVs up to 60", Tobacco Brown
product_meta.description: Size:53 inch| Color:Tobacco BrownHaving just purchased your dream large flat screen TV - you need the perfect TV Stand to enhance your viewing pleasure. Look no further. The Acadian TV Stand is perfectly sized for TVs up to 60 inches. The 35 inch height puts the TV at a level that is ideal for comfortable viewing. The Acadian TV Stand has plenty of storage and space for all your media and gaming devices. It has a large centrally located open area with one adjustable shelf and two drawers. The two large side storage cabinets open to two adjustable shelves. The unit features cord management cut-outs for easy installation of TV and media components. Open center with two adjustable shelves and cord management cutouts for easy installation of TV and media components. Style includes elegantly tapered legs, grooved sides, molded crown edged table top and Brushed Nickel rounded square knobs. Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography. At Simpli Home we believe in creating excellent, high quality products made from the finest materials at an affordable price. Every one of our products come with a 1-year warranty and easy returns if you are not satisfied.
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: 16.5" D x 53" W x 34.8" H
SOLID WOOD: Handcrafted with care using the finest quality Pine
HAND FINISHED with a Dark Tobacco Brown stain and a protective NC lacquer to accentuate and highlight the grain and the uniqueness of each piece of furniture.

Extra functional TV Stand includes central area includes one open adjustable shelf with cord management cut outs and two drawers; two door side cabinets with tempered glass window pane door panels open to adjustable shelves
MULTIPURPOSE CABINET can be used as a TV stand for TV's up to 60 inches, as an accent storage cabinet, or buffet sideboard. Looks great in your living room, great room, bedroom or dining room.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars465 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
